title: We Bought the Farm
overview: In HGTV's We Bought the Farm, families wishing for wide-open spaces head to the great outdoors to search for the luxury farmhouse of their dreams. From hundreds of sprawling acres to classic, quaint country living, follow along as they look for the perfect homestead and discover some of the most affordable and beautiful locations, proving you don't have to be a millionaire to buy the farm of your dreams.
